page.title: 08Reply From The MP Continued
page.content: So there are other benefits for local people. 3. The development of the Old Gasworks site in Old Poole will lead to more houses as well as trade and industry in that area. It may also lead to major changes in the road system serving that part of the town. The people at the Civic Centre will be able to show you a map of what is proposed. 4. Poole is an old town with a history going back many hundreds of years. The port of Poole and its harbour have always been important assets for both trade and leisure purposes. We are lucky to live in such a lovely area and, as Poole grows and changes, we must ensure that we also preserve what is good of the past and so hand on to future generations a town of which they too can be proud. (sgd)John Ward
